add_object(name, obj, x, y)[source]¶

Places objects on the table

Objects will be placed directly on the table’s surface.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The key to reference the object

  • obj (rbw.shapes.Shape) – Object to add to table

  • x (float) –

  • x location of the object. (The) –

  • y (float) –

  • y location of the object. (The) –
